in times of conflict it’s imperative that we don’t give up hope and that we remember those who have faced violent challenges on a local and global stage and stood up for peace and equality
that’s why this week we’re highlighting european commission peace scholars who have fought for justice in their own way we hope their stories will inspire hope during this time of increasing conflict around the world
starting with achaleke leke and how he turned his experiences into a tool for supporting others
